metadata.synopsis: The player speaks up on entering one of the trial areas in the temple of Shar. If they had previously read a book in the library area, they'll have an idea of what they need to do (navigate the maze and get through the locked door on the far side without being detected/setting off a trap). Otherwise they'll be none the wiser.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the trial area after having read/not read the clue book in the library

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Lady Shar values those that can remain unseen and can still obtain what they want. Stealth is a virtue derived from her very essence.
0.context: NodeContext: Reverent, as if quoting religious teachings from memory. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I feel like I'm missing something here... what am I supposed to do?

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Like the book said - I've to get through this maze without getting caught or triggering a trap. Simple... I hope.
